Description:
An adversary may use legitimate desktop support and remote access software,to establish an interactive command and control channel to target systems within networks

Author: frack113
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Use of UltraVNC Remote Access Software
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where description = 'vncviewer' and product = 'ultravnc vncviewer' and company = 'ultravnc' and original_file_name = 'vncviewer.exe'
